alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, northern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from New Port Richey East to near Gandy. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, New Port Richey, Hudson, Holiday, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, New Port Richey East, Beacon Square, Keystone, Tampa International Airport, East Lake, Gandy, Jasmine Estates, Citrus Park, Feather Sound and West And East Lealman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
